attack_skill.1: 1 Is added to the units base attack
attack_skill.2: 2 Is added to the units base attack.

defence_skill.1: 1 Is added to the units base defence.
defence_skill.2: 2 Is added to the units base attack.

range_skill.1: 1 Is added to the units base range

movement_skill.1: 1 Is added to the units base movement

attack_cooldown.1: Can only attack every third turn.
attack_cooldown.2: Can only attack every second turn

berserking.1: Can move 4 tiles if movement ends with an attack.

combat_agility.1: Can make an attack after its first action. (But not a second move.)

crusading.1: Friendly melee units starting their movement in one of the 8 tiles surrounding Crusader get +1A.
crusading.2: Friendly melee units starting their movement in one of the 8 tiles surrounding Crusader get +1A, +1D

defence_maneuverability.1: Can move two tiles if one of them is sideways.

extra_life.1: It takes two successful hits to kill this unit.

flag_bearing.1: Friendly melee units receive +2A if attacking from a tile adjacent to Flag Bearer.
flag_bearing.2: Friendly melee units receive +2A if attacking from a tile surrounding Flag Bearer.

flanking.1: If it attacks from the side or the rear, 2 is added to its attack.
flanking.2: If it attacks from the side or the rear, 4 is added to its attack.

javelin.1: Can one time make a ranged attack with range 3. The defending unit has it's defence reduced by 1.

lancing.1: If it starts movement with 2 empty tiles between lancer and the unit it attacks, + 3A.
lancing.2: If it starts movement with 3 empty tiles between lancer and the unit it attacks, + 3A.

longsword.1: Also hits the 4 nearby tiles in the attack direction.

push.1: If attack and defence rolls both succeed, it can still move forward. Opponents units must retreat directly backwards or die.

rage.1: Can make an attack after it's move. (But not a second move.)

ride_through.1: If there is an enemy unit next to it, and the tile behind that unit is empty, it can make an attack where it ends up on this empty tile.

spread_attack.1: Also attacks the adjacent tiles, even if your units are standing there.

swiftness.1: Can use remaining moves after attacking.

triple_attack.1: Also hits the two diagonally nearby tiles in the attack direction.

zoc_all.1: No enemy units can move past unit.

zoc_cavalry.1: Cavalry can't move past this unit.

states.extra_action: Whether the unit is doing its extra action.
states.lost_extra_life: Whether the unit has lost its extra life
states.javelin_thrown: Whether a unit has used it's javelin
states.movement_remaining: Movement points left for doing an extra action
states.used: Whether a unit has been used this turn.
states.recently_bribed: Whether a unit was bribed last turn.
states.flanked: This unit was attacked by a unit with flanking last turn.

bribed.1: Unit is controlled by opponent and has +1 attack.
bribed.2: Unit is controlled by opponent and has +2 attack.

sabotaged.1: Units defence is reduced to 0, and it has no zone of control.
sabotaged.2: Units defence is reduced to 0, and it has no zone of control.

bribe.1: You can use an opponent's unit this turn. Your opponent can't use it on his next turn. The unit gets +1A until end of turn.
bribe.2: You can use an opponent's unit this turn. Your opponent can't use it on his next turn. The unit gets +2A until end of turn.

improve_weapons.1: Give melee unit +3 attack, +1 defence until your next turn.
improve_weapons.2: Give melee unit +2 attack, +1 defence for two turns.

poison.1: Makes a unit unable to perform actions until your next turn.
poison.2: Makes a unit unable to perform actions for two turns.

sabotage.1: Reduces a units defence to 0 this turn.
sabotage.2: Reduces a units defence to 0 for two turns.

assassinate.1: Attempt to assassinate any unit on the board with a 66% probability of success After the attempt there is a 50% risk that Assassin is discovered and killed. Assassinate can only be performed on the second action.
assassinate.2: Attempt to assassinate any unit on the board with a 100% probability of success After the attempt there is a 50% risk that Assassin is discovered and killed. Assassinate can only be performed on the second action.
